title: 如何修改武器的攻击力
author: habit№despair
txt_content: 如题，上次看人玩最后的恶魔（链接在此http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-229776-1-1.html）看见有把钻石剑50攻击力无附魔，我顿时惊呆了瞎狗眼{:10_514:}，求教这是怎么弄的

replies.author: 星E君
replies.txt_content:
命令方块输入/give @p minecraft:diamond_sword 1 0 
{AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:50.0,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Attack}]}复制代码

replies.author: ss5417
replies.txt_content: 用nbt修改    去这里看一下吧

replies.author: habit№despair
replies.txt_content:
ss5417 发表于 2014-2-11 09:57
用nbt修改    去这里看一下吧
关键是哪一篇啊

replies.txt_content:
